name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Rails Engineer with 8 years of expertise in developing high-performance applications using **Ruby on Rails**, **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **Sidekiq**. Proficient in implementing async processing solutions with **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka** and building search functionality with **Elasticsearch** and **Solr**. Experienced in deploying applications using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, alongside strong cloud experience on **AWS** and **GCP**. 

My background includes full-stack development with **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, allowing me to architect solutions across healthcare and financial domains effectively. I have a proven track record of leading enterprise-grade platform development, integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation. 

With a solid foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, I ensure robust, secure applications that meet compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. I have hands-on experience in developing and deploying machine learning pipelines utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, contributing to streamlined MLOps workflows.
